description: Styles for application themes, including light and dark modes, responsive design, and animations for the app logo.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with text alignment and background color based on theme.

classes.description: Styling for links within the application themed based on the color palette.

classes.description: Button for toggling between themes with hover and active states.
